Lyric:
[by:撕纸做的偏执狂]
[ti:blink]
[ar:Frankie]
[al:]
[by:九九Lrc歌词网～www.99Lrc.net]
[00:03.75]We're just a blink
[00:06.67]A little bit of history
[00:09.45]But the gods are left to notice
[00:12.33]Such a perfect moment
[00:14.83]Don't you think
[00:16.94]Life's worth the mystery
[00:19.84]And even though we come and go
[00:22.95]There's so much we could see in just a blink

[00:26.56]Ain't it kinda funny how
[00:29.28]We can think we got it figured out
[00:31.71]But the universe is all about
[00:33.71]Up and down and back around again
[00:36.81]I was standing on the concrete
[00:39.51]In the middle of our old street
[00:42.02]Being where we used to be
[00:44.27]I couldn't really help but think
[00:45.73]Listen

[00:47.10]I've been low, I've been high
[00:49.27]I've been wrong, I've been right
[00:51.83]I hit the ground so hard
[00:53.90]it hurts so bad
[00:57.09]I've seen dark, I've seen light
[00:59.64]I've seen death, I've seen life
[01:02.20]I'm just the stories I hold

[01:05.92]'Cause we're just a blink
[01:08.44]A little bit of history
[01:11.30]But the gods are left to notice
[01:14.35]Such a perfect moment
[01:16.71]Don't you think
[01:18.84]Life's worth the mystery
[01:21.36]And even though we come and go
[01:24.80]There's so much we could see in just a blink
[01:35.04]So much we could see in just a blink

[01:39.02]Do ya ever wonder how
[01:41.51]We forget about the humor now
[01:43.64]All the people who come in and out
[01:45.79]Might never come back around again
[01:49.21]Well it was even in my mind and
[01:51.73]Should've gotten you in a moment
[01:54.09]As I stood there in the street
[01:55.99]I couldn't really help but think
[01:57.82]Listen

[01:59.90]I've been low, I've been high
[02:01.55]I've been wrong, I've been right
[02:04.11]I hit the ground so hard
[02:06.08]it hurts so bad
[02:09.18]I've seen dark, I've seen light
[02:11.77]I've seen death, I've seen life
[02:14.63]I'm just the stories I hold

[02:17.28]'Cause we're just a blink

[02:23.87]But the gods are left to notice
[02:26.79]Such a perfect moment
[02:28.82]Don't you think

[02:33.64]And even though we come and go
[02:36.86]There's so much we could see in just a blink
[02:47.31]So much we could see in just a blink

[03:15.04]But the gods are left to notice
